text: Mehrangiz Morovvati (; born 1962) is an Iranian politician. Morovvati was born in Khalkhal, Ardabil Province. He is a member of the 2000 and 2004 Islamic Consultative Assembly from the electorate of Khalkhal and Kowsar. ==References== Category:People from Khalkhal, Iran Category:Iranian Azerbaijani politicians Category:Deputies of Khalkhal and Kowsar Category:Living people Category:Iranian women in politics Category:1962 births Category:Members of the 6th Islamic Consultative Assembly Category:Members of the 7th Islamic Consultative Assembly Category:National Trust Party (Iran) politicians Category:Iranian Shia Muslims Category:Ethnic Azerbaijani Shia Muslims Category:21st-century women politicians
title: Mehrangiz Morovvati
